# Software Requirements Specification (SRS) — Template

> Anchors: **29148** (SRS content/quality/trace), **12207** (Requirements processes), **15289** (information item)

## 1. Purpose & Scope

-   System goals; in/out of scope; stakeholders (tie to 42010 packet).

## 2. References & Definitions

-   Refer to Standards Crosswalk; include glossary terms used.

## 3. Overall Description

-   Users, operating environment, constraints/assumptions.

## 4. Specific Requirements (verifiable “shall” statements)

| ---------------- | -------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| FGC-REQ-CORE-001 | …                    | …         | e.g., 95% within 200 ms          | Test                                                |
